text: Ban Hyo-jung (born Ban Man-hee on November 27, 1942) is a South Korean actress. She made her acting debut in 1964 with a bit part in Shin Sang-ok's film Rice, and went on to a prolific career in television dramas. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable" style="width:650px" |- ! width=10|Year !
